thread.title: BRIEF-Nufarm Finance (NZ) Executes Documentation Relating To Refinancing Of Group's Existing Syndicated Banking Facility

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Nufarm Finance (NZ) Executes Documentation Relating To Refinancing Of Group's Existing Syndicated Banking Facility

organizations.name: refinancing of group's existing syndicated banking facility

text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Nufarm Finance (Nz) Ltd:
* ENTERED INTO AND EXECUTED DOCUMENTATION RELATING TO REFINANCING OF NUFARM LTD GROUP‘S EXISTING SYNDICATED BANKING FACILITY
* ‍ SYNDICATED BANK FACILITY WAS INCREASED IN SIZE TO A$665 MILLION FOR A TERM OF THREE YEARS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
